SUPERNOVA ( www.supernova-id.com) was established in 1981. Through out the years with its dedicated employees and experienced management, the company has become one of the leading manufacturers of specialty packaging film and converted flexible packaging in the South East Asia region. We have more than 2000 employees in Cikarang (Jababeka 2 & Jababeka 6), Cibitung (MM2100) and North Jakarta (Ancol) Plant with high comitment in ISO 9001, ISO 22000, ISO 45001, ISO 14001, Halal Certificate & SMK3.

GUITAR INSPECTOR AND PRODUCTION CONTROLER, GUITAR INSPECTOR AND PRODUCTION CONTROLER, Main Job Role (Primary Job Role):Responsible for testing guitar products and other musical instruments both in terms of quality and quantity during the final production process to obtain the quality standards required by the company., Main Job Role (Primary Job Role):, MAIN TASKS (Key Tasks):1. Quality Control and Quality Assurance: Monitoring all product developments from inception to production including carrying out testing to ensure final product quality.2. Product Documentation: Documenting product testing that has been carried out for company archives including recording all documentation processes. regarding products produced to serve as a reference in the future.3. Production Process Monitoring: Monitoring, analyzing and researching the entire product manufacturing process and ensuring that the quality of the product produced is in accordance with applicable standards.4. Product Repair: Repairing products that have production defects and deciding the suitability of the product before the final process.5. Guitar Tuning: determining and setting the tone on an open string guitar, including acoustic guitars, electric guitars and classical guitars with the aim that the resulting tones are standard., MAIN TASKS (Key Tasks):, QUALIFICATION (Qualification):, QUALIFICATION (Qualification):, • Aged between 20 - 35 years• Passionate about music, especially the guitar instrument• Have advanced Guitar playing skills.• Graduated from a reputable University.• Good Speaking and Writing English• Have a minimum of 3 years experience in the QAQC field• Proficient in playing guitar• Understand Guitar settings• Can work as a team• Physically and mentally healthy• Have talent as a Team Leader• Ready to work overtime if needed,

, About us, About us, Berdiri sejak tahun 2012 dengan nama CV Geoworld Indonesia hanya berfokus pada konsultan perencanaan dan pelaksanaan pertambangan. Pada tahun 2018 kami berganti nama menjadi PT Bumi Indo Resources (Bumines). Dan menambahkan sektor usaha sebagai kontrakor pertambangan di bidang penggalian, pengangkutan, pemberaian, peledakan dan reklamasi tambang.


Bersama Bumines, dedikasi dan kecepatan adalah keunggulan kami. Desc: Job Descriptions:1. Organizing, preparing, and coordinating schedules for meetings and activities of Board of Director.2. Planning travel schedules and preparing facilities/resources for Board of Director activities.3. Maintaining confidentiality of documentation and information related to all activities of superiors.4. Managing company letters, documents, and invoices according to applicable procedures requiring Board of Director approval, ensuring that all letters/documents are up-to-date.5. Managing the storage of Board of Director meeting minutes for easy retrieval by superiors and ensuring that the minutes are up-to-date.6. Drafting letters, memos, and minutes related to the Board of Directors, addressed to internal and external parties, to ensure information is understood by all relevant parties.7. Managing Petty Cash to support the needs of Board of Directors' activities and preparing accurate and periodic reports for superiors., Job Requirements:1. Bachelor Degree (S1) majoring in Secretary or Business Administration & Management.2. Have minimum 2 - 5 years of work experience as Secretary – in Corporate would be preferable.3. Have good communication and interpersonal skills4. Required Competencies : Secretarial, Document Management and Office Administration5. Good command in English both Oral & Written.,

Desc: Menjadi koordinator antara karyawan Tiongkok dan karyawan indonesia untuk menyelesaikan semua tugas yang diberikan oleh atasan, 做为中国员工和印尼员工之间的协管员，完成上级交办的所有任务, , , Kriteria :, 要求, 1. Usia 18 - 45 Tahun, 年龄 18 - 45 岁, 2. Pendidikan minimal SMA sederajat (SD dan SMP juga bisa, dengan syarat bisa mengetik bahasa Mandarin), 高中学历以上（小学和初中也可以，但要求能打汉字）, 3. Mampu berbicara dan mendengar dalam bahasa Mandarin, 能听和说汉语, 4. Dapat membaca dan tulis dalam bahasa Mandarin, 能读写汉字, 5. Bisa mengoperasikan komputer, minimal Microsoft Office, 能操作电脑，至少办公软件, 6. Sehat jasmani dan rohani, 身心健康, 7. Bersedia ditempatkan di Morowali, Sulawesi Tengah, 愿意在中苏拉维西，莫罗瓦利上班, , , Gaji dan tunjangan, 薪资待遇, 1. Total gaji bulanan 10 juta - 13 juta (semakin tinggi level skill bahasa maka semakin tinggi gajinya), 月综合收入10条-13条（语言技能等级越高则工资越高）, 2. BPJS Kesehatan dan Ketenagakerjaan, 健康与劳动保险, 3. PPH 21 ditanggung perusahaan, 所得税21由公司承担, 4. Uang lembur dan THR, 加班费与节日补贴, 5. Tunjangan pulsa, 话费补贴, , Benefit, 福利待遇：, 1. Disediakan mess, tempat tidur dan perlengkapannya, 1 mess 3-4 orang, di dalam mess ada Wi-fi, AC, air panas dan kamar mandi dalam., 免费提供宿舍及床上用品，住宿一般3-4人间，房间内有 Wi-fi、空调、热水、独立卫生间。, 2. Disediakan makan sehari 3 kali, air mineral, 提供一天三餐、矿泉水, 3. Setiap 3 bulan dapat cuti sekali, sekali cuti 14 hari, tiket pesawat pulang pergi ditanggung oleh perusahaan, jika karyawan memilih untuk tidak mengambil cuti, akan mendapatkan tunjangan sebesar Rp 6.000.000,-, 每三个月休假一次，每次14天，往返机票由公司承担，若员工放弃休假，可拿到6条印尼盾作为放弃休假补贴。, 3. Pengobatan di klinik dan Medical Check Up tahunan gratis, 免费在园区医院就诊与年度体检, 4. Tiket pesawat waktu pertama kali bergabung bisa diklaim ke perusahaan, 员工第一次进矿的飞机票可以向公司报销,

Job Summary:, Job Summary:, , The Talent Acquisition Specialist plays a crucial role in the human resources department by managing the end-to-end recruitment process, identifying, recruiting, and acquiring skilled individuals to meet the staffing needs of an organization., Key Responsibilities:, Key Responsibilities:, Collaborate with hiring managers to understand their staffing needs and create job descriptions.Source candidates through various channels, such as job boards, social media, and professional networks.Conduct initial resume screenings and evaluate applicants based on qualifications and cultural fit.Coordinate and conduct interviews, assessments, and reference checks.Maintain candidate records, extend job offers and assist with the negotiation process.Develop and implement effective recruitment strategies to attract a diverse pool of candidates.Leveraging social media platforms to showcase the company culture, values, and achievements is a key aspect of employer branding. Desc: , About us, About us, PT. Karya Anugerah Jaya merupakan perusahaan Nasional yang berdiri sejak tahun 1991 dengan nama UD. Anugerah Jaya sebagai jawaban para konsumen yang membutuhkan pewarna makanan dan bahan tambahan pangan lainnya. Seiring perkembangannya pada tahun 1996 UD. Anugerah Jaya berganti nama dan bentuk perusahaan menjadi PT. Karya Anugerah Jaya yang kini telah menjadi salah satu industri pewarna makanan dan bahan tambahan pangan yang kompetitif di Indonesia dan memiliki 30 cabang di seluruh indonesia. Dengan membawa merek dagang R&W dan ALCO. Semua produk kami telah terdaftar di Badan Pengawas Obat dan Makanan (BPOM.RI) serta memperoleh sertifikasi dari Majelis Ulama Indonesia (MUI). PT. 1.           Deliver Financial target in every plan and forecast cycles that cover of controlling industrial margin, supply fixed cost, productivity and capex spend, 2.           Prepare numbers for Capex & Opex in every plan & forecast cycle with accuracy including system submission., 3.           Strong business partnering to support delivery financial target by active intervention on Capital Expenditure and Factory cost control, 4.           Monitoring Fixed Assets in the factory covering lead fixed asset verification (asset count) and propose fixed asset impairment if there is any., 5.           Coordinate with Plant Team to achieve productivity related with opex to support delivery of target, 6.           As part of finance compliance,  support on all Audit activities , coordinate the audit points closure and lead self assessment audit in factory to meet minimum set of financial controls, 7.           Ensure Month End Closing reporting accuracy with detail analysis on the gap/flux between actual vs plan/forecast, 8.           Support any  system transformation that happened in the factory,

Identify and target new business opportunities in the education sector, specifically focusing on schools and educational institutions., - Build and maintain relationships with key decision-makers in schools, including administrators, principals, and teachers., - Conduct market research to understand the needs and challenges of schools in adopting educational tools., - Present and demonstrate our education tools to potential clients, showcasing how our solutions can enhance learning outcomes., - Collaborate with the marketing team to develop targeted campaigns and materials for the education sector., - Achieve and exceed sales targets through effective prospecting, negotiation, and closing of deals., - Provide ongoing support to clients, ensuring their satisfaction and addressing any issues that may arise., - Stay informed about industry trends, competitor products, and educational policies to effectively position our offerings in the market., , Requirements:, Requirements:, - Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, education, or a related field., - 1-2 years of experience in business development, strategic planning, or a similar role, preferably within the education sector., - Proven track record in B2B sales, with experience in selling to educational institutions being a plus., - Excellent communication and presentation skills., - Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients., - Self-motivated and results-oriented., - Familiarity with education technology and tools is advantageous., - Education or distribution experience will be an advantage., - Male or female, 20-30 years old., , Our offer:, Our offer:, - Attractive monthly salary + commission, - International working environment, - Paid trainings, - Opportunity to grow, - Work in comfortable office in Kemayoran, Jakarta, , If this sounds like you, please send us your CV with a cover letter telling us why you'd be perfect for the role.,

Desc: Industry: Logistics, , You will be responsible for:, • Answer all customer inquiries regarding company's services in a prompt, courteous and professional manner (Professionally handle incoming requests from customers and ensure that issues are resolved both promptly and thoroughly), • Ensure that booking inquiries, traces and complaints are registered into the systems and dealt with both speedily and satisfactorily within the company operating standards and procedures, • Focus on customers needs and requirements, recommending appropriate course of actions so as to delight customers and prevent any claims or complaints, • Conduct full investigation of complaints and make use of the proper tracing escalation guidelines to solve the complaint within the shortest time possible and to the customer's satisfaction, • Proactively respond and update both customers and the network in accordance with the company's Services Commitment, • Advise customers or company network where appropriate and inform them of any irregularities ie bad address, incomplete paperwork, wrong destination code, etc in order to preempt future problems, • Complete all required reports as and when needed, • Alert the respective Area Customer Service Manager of any potential problems, complaints and other services irregularities/failures that needs to be corrected to avoid recurrence, • Escalate any serious problem unsolved or unresponded by company network to the respective Area Customer Service Manager (Resolves product or service problems by clarifying the customer's complaint, determining the cause of the problem, selecting and explaining the best solution to solve the problem, expediting correction or adjustment, following up to ensure resolution and service recovery to maintain customer satisfaction), • To make an order or pickup request, monitor shipping movements, ensure service is delivered according to customers request, • Maintain a balance between company policy, government policy and customer benefit in decision making. Handles issues in the best interest of both of them, • Advicing customers for potential products or services, • Creating regular reports, information and feedback to relevant department and customers when needed, • Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed, , Key qualification:, •Fluent speaking in English, Fluent speaking in English, • Bachelor Degree, • Good Communication, • Good self-presentation, • Problem solving, • Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced multinational company, , Department: Customer Service, Report to: CS Manager, Overtime bonus: Yes, Status: 6 months contract to be permanent, Working days: Mon – Fri, Saturday and Sunday will be counted as overtime, Placement: South Jakarta,

Strong sales abilities, self-motivated, and have brands or KOLs resources., 5. About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress

You also need towrite testable and clean codeto develop highlyreliableandmaintainable code. Your primary focus will be onproviding back-end service for our websiteandour ERP.

Job_title: Synergy Value Chain & Business Partnership Analyst
Desc: Formulate synergy/collaboration needed to strengthen and compliment Astra Financial Business.Initiate synergy/collaboration within Astra Ecosystem or with external partners that will compliment Astra Financial digital initiatives business.Do PDCA and review for every collaboration (reporting & monitoring)Support on making strategy for business partnership collaboration for digital initiatives for Astra Financial digital ventures (SEVA, MOXA, DaaS/CaaS & Digital Bank).Do execution for the strategy that has been formulated and approved by management.

As Center Manager, you are responsible for the center’s day-to-day operational activities. You are responsible for a center’s staff, customer, and business performance. You are expected to lead center revenue performance, support day-to-day center operations, and manage center team.Key ResponsibilitiesEmbody EF core values and set a service-oriented, collaborative culture in the center through role-modelling.Engage with customers actively and personally and create an environment in which all staff treat our customers respectfully, like they are your first or last.Identify new ways to deliver the best customer services; take care of customer complaints and turn unhappy or angry customers into our advocate.Responsible to the achievement of Center’s revenue by leading the team through various customer acquisition channels, including referral and retention of current students.Monitor the center performance through verification and analysis of sales reports and student satisfaction reports (NPS results); make sure center follows all EF English Center processes, policies, and procedures.Lead the Sales, Service and Academic team in acquiring new students, maintaining number of students and ensure memorable learning experience throughout the study period.Come up with ideas and feedback in order to make things better, that help improve the business continuously.Ensure a safe, clean, delightful working and learning environment for staff and students; in a nutshell, run and grow a meaningful business with sound financial result, through people and service.

Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing toolsProvides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices EnvironmentAssist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findingsLiasing with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring ThreatsAnalyse and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flowEscalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scannerConduct scheduled Vulnerability Management

About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress

Company: SMS Perkasa (PT Sumber Makmur Surya Perkasa)
Desc: What are your responsibilities?This role requires you to beable to work as a team. You are responsible tomaintainandcreate data endpointsfor a front-end developer. You also need towrite testable and clean codeto develop highlyreliableandmaintainable code. Your primary focus will be onproviding back-end service for our websiteandour ERP.

Job_title: Branch Manager Development Program (Area Jawa Bal Nusra)
Desc: On the Supervisor programLearn how to understanding Basic Knowledge and policy of SMS FinanceApplying Marketing & Collection Spv knowledge into practical application in real-life settingOn the Branch Manager programLearn how to understanding monitoring and controlling as Branch ManagerObserving Branch Manager activity, analyze and solve complex problemManage Branch and show performance as Branch Manager

Job_title: Synergy Value Chain & Business Partnership Analyst
Desc: Formulate synergy/collaboration needed to strengthen and compliment Astra Financial Business.Initiate synergy/collaboration within Astra Ecosystem or with external partners that will compliment Astra Financial digital initiatives business.Do PDCA and review for every collaboration (reporting & monitoring)Support on making strategy for business partnership collaboration for digital initiatives for Astra Financial digital ventures (SEVA, MOXA, DaaS/CaaS & Digital Bank).Do execution for the strategy that has been formulated and approved by management.

As Center Manager, you are responsible for the center’s day-to-day operational activities. You are responsible for a center’s staff, customer, and business performance. You are expected to lead center revenue performance, support day-to-day center operations, and manage center team.Key ResponsibilitiesEmbody EF core values and set a service-oriented, collaborative culture in the center through role-modelling.Engage with customers actively and personally and create an environment in which all staff treat our customers respectfully, like they are your first or last.Identify new ways to deliver the best customer services; take care of customer complaints and turn unhappy or angry customers into our advocate.Responsible to the achievement of Center’s revenue by leading the team through various customer acquisition channels, including referral and retention of current students.Monitor the center performance through verification and analysis of sales reports and student satisfaction reports (NPS results); make sure center follows all EF English Center processes, policies, and procedures.Lead the Sales, Service and Academic team in acquiring new students, maintaining number of students and ensure memorable learning experience throughout the study period.Come up with ideas and feedback in order to make things better, that help improve the business continuously.Ensure a safe, clean, delightful working and learning environment for staff and students; in a nutshell, run and grow a meaningful business with sound financial result, through people and service.

Memastikan operasional environment DC & DRC berjalan dengan baik dan meminimalisir kemungkinan gangguan atau critical event dan kegagalan operasi dalam mendukung operasional bisnis perusahaanMelakukan aktivitas-aktivitas rutin IT yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan bisnis utama perbankan seperti proses back up, proses end of day, end of month, dsbMelakukan pemeliharaan switching DC-DRC, core switch dan core router DC-DRCMenyediakan laporan performance mesin AS 400, DC-DRC secara berkalaMelakukan manage configurationBerperan serta dalam pengusulan inisiatif untuk perbaikan kinerja layanan

Memastikan operasional environment DC & DRC berjalan dengan baik dan meminimalisir kemungkinan gangguan atau critical event dan kegagalan operasi dalam mendukung operasional bisnis perusahaanMelakukan aktivitas-aktivitas rutin IT yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan bisnis utama perbankan seperti proses back up, proses end of day, end of month, dsbMelakukan pemeliharaan switching DC-DRC, core switch dan core router DC-DRCMenyediakan laporan performance mesin AS 400, DC-DRC secara berkalaMelakukan manage configurationBerperan serta dalam pengusulan inisiatif untuk perbaikan kinerja layanan

Job_title: Branch Manager Development Program (Area Sumatera Bag Selatan)
Desc: On the Supervisor programLearn how to understanding Basic Knowledge and policy of SMS FinanceApplying Marketing & Collection Spv knowledge into practical application in real-life settingOn the Branch Manager programLearn how to understanding monitoring and controlling as Branch ManagerObserving Branch Manager activity, analyze and solve complex problemManage Branch and show performance as Branch Manager

Design, develop, and ship product features and improvementsResearch, conceive, design, and develop backend components and tools to extend, improve, stabilize your team's backend.Take an active role in code reviews & pull requests, get your own code reviewed by the team and become a better developer overallPartnering closely with the Product Team to evaluate the technical feasibility, release, and timely execution of featuresAnalyze carrier requirements, with a larger team, to define high level architecture, collaborate with senior developers across the team on design.Review and approve the detailed designs.Drive all aspects of the development including requirements definition, design, implementation, unit testing, and integration.

Menganalisis data dan informasi bisnis dari berbagai sumber untuk menghasilkan insight atas tren/pola dari data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis bagi para stakeholder.Mengidentifikasi, mengumpulkan, dan membersihkan data terstruktur maupun tidak terstruktur dari berbagai sumber untuk menyiapkan proses analisis data.Mengembangkan produk atau existing data untuk use case baru dalam analisis data.Menganalisis dan menginterpretasi data dalam jumlah besar dengan mempertimbangkan informasi bisnis terkait untuk mengidentifikasi dan memahami tren/pola data.

Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing toolsProvides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices EnvironmentAssist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findingsLiasing with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring ThreatsAnalyse and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flowEscalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scannerConduct scheduled Vulnerability Management

About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress

Menganalisis data dan informasi bisnis dari berbagai sumber untuk menghasilkan insight atas tren/pola dari data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis bagi para stakeholder.Mengidentifikasi, mengumpulkan, dan membersihkan data terstruktur maupun tidak terstruktur dari berbagai sumber untuk menyiapkan proses analisis data.Mengembangkan produk atau existing data untuk use case baru dalam analisis data.Menganalisis dan menginterpretasi data dalam jumlah besar dengan mempertimbangkan informasi bisnis terkait untuk mengidentifikasi dan memahami tren/pola data.

Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing toolsProvides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices EnvironmentAssist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findingsLiasing with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring ThreatsAnalyse and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flowEscalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scannerConduct scheduled Vulnerability Management

About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress

Company: SMS Perkasa (PT Sumber Makmur Surya Perkasa)
Desc: What are your responsibilities?This role requires you to beable to work as a team. You are responsible tomaintainandcreate data endpointsfor a front-end developer. You also need towrite testable and clean codeto develop highlyreliableandmaintainable code. Your primary focus will be onproviding back-end service for our websiteandour ERP.

Job_title: Branch Manager Development Program (Area Jawa Bal Nusra)
Desc: On the Supervisor programLearn how to understanding Basic Knowledge and policy of SMS FinanceApplying Marketing & Collection Spv knowledge into practical application in real-life settingOn the Branch Manager programLearn how to understanding monitoring and controlling as Branch ManagerObserving Branch Manager activity, analyze and solve complex problemManage Branch and show performance as Branch Manager

Job_title: Synergy Value Chain & Business Partnership Analyst
Desc: Formulate synergy/collaboration needed to strengthen and compliment Astra Financial Business.Initiate synergy/collaboration within Astra Ecosystem or with external partners that will compliment Astra Financial digital initiatives business.Do PDCA and review for every collaboration (reporting & monitoring)Support on making strategy for business partnership collaboration for digital initiatives for Astra Financial digital ventures (SEVA, MOXA, DaaS/CaaS & Digital Bank).Do execution for the strategy that has been formulated and approved by management.

As Center Manager, you are responsible for the center’s day-to-day operational activities. You are responsible for a center’s staff, customer, and business performance. You are expected to lead center revenue performance, support day-to-day center operations, and manage center team.Key ResponsibilitiesEmbody EF core values and set a service-oriented, collaborative culture in the center through role-modelling.Engage with customers actively and personally and create an environment in which all staff treat our customers respectfully, like they are your first or last.Identify new ways to deliver the best customer services; take care of customer complaints and turn unhappy or angry customers into our advocate.Responsible to the achievement of Center’s revenue by leading the team through various customer acquisition channels, including referral and retention of current students.Monitor the center performance through verification and analysis of sales reports and student satisfaction reports (NPS results); make sure center follows all EF English Center processes, policies, and procedures.Lead the Sales, Service and Academic team in acquiring new students, maintaining number of students and ensure memorable learning experience throughout the study period.Come up with ideas and feedback in order to make things better, that help improve the business continuously.Ensure a safe, clean, delightful working and learning environment for staff and students; in a nutshell, run and grow a meaningful business with sound financial result, through people and service.

Memastikan operasional environment DC & DRC berjalan dengan baik dan meminimalisir kemungkinan gangguan atau critical event dan kegagalan operasi dalam mendukung operasional bisnis perusahaanMelakukan aktivitas-aktivitas rutin IT yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan bisnis utama perbankan seperti proses back up, proses end of day, end of month, dsbMelakukan pemeliharaan switching DC-DRC, core switch dan core router DC-DRCMenyediakan laporan performance mesin AS 400, DC-DRC secara berkalaMelakukan manage configurationBerperan serta dalam pengusulan inisiatif untuk perbaikan kinerja layanan

Company: DOKU, PT NUSA SATU INTI ARTHA
Desc: Mampu membuat laporan hasil temuan atau jika adanya security anomali.Mampu memberi saran atau solusi teknis untuk tim TI dan tim software developerMenindaklanjuti hasil temuan kerentanan ke tim terkaitMampu menggunakan Tools Security Testing atau membuat tools sendiriWajib mendokumentasikan semua proses pekerjaan dengan detail.

Producing code using .NET Core.Net, Sequel, C#Upgrading, configuring and debugging existing systemsProviding technical support for web, desktop or mobile applications

Memastikan operasional environment DC & DRC berjalan dengan baik dan meminimalisir kemungkinan gangguan atau critical event dan kegagalan operasi dalam mendukung operasional bisnis perusahaanMelakukan aktivitas-aktivitas rutin IT yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan bisnis utama perbankan seperti proses back up, proses end of day, end of month, dsbMelakukan pemeliharaan switching DC-DRC, core switch dan core router DC-DRCMenyediakan laporan performance mesin AS 400, DC-DRC secara berkalaMelakukan manage configurationBerperan serta dalam pengusulan inisiatif untuk perbaikan kinerja layanan

Job_title: Branch Manager Development Program (Area Sumatera Bag Selatan)
Desc: On the Supervisor programLearn how to understanding Basic Knowledge and policy of SMS FinanceApplying Marketing & Collection Spv knowledge into practical application in real-life settingOn the Branch Manager programLearn how to understanding monitoring and controlling as Branch ManagerObserving Branch Manager activity, analyze and solve complex problemManage Branch and show performance as Branch Manager

Design, develop, and ship product features and improvementsResearch, conceive, design, and develop backend components and tools to extend, improve, stabilize your team's backend.Take an active role in code reviews & pull requests, get your own code reviewed by the team and become a better developer overallPartnering closely with the Product Team to evaluate the technical feasibility, release, and timely execution of featuresAnalyze carrier requirements, with a larger team, to define high level architecture, collaborate with senior developers across the team on design.Review and approve the detailed designs.Drive all aspects of the development including requirements definition, design, implementation, unit testing, and integration.

Menganalisis data dan informasi bisnis dari berbagai sumber untuk menghasilkan insight atas tren/pola dari data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis bagi para stakeholder.Mengidentifikasi, mengumpulkan, dan membersihkan data terstruktur maupun tidak terstruktur dari berbagai sumber untuk menyiapkan proses analisis data.Mengembangkan produk atau existing data untuk use case baru dalam analisis data.Menganalisis dan menginterpretasi data dalam jumlah besar dengan mempertimbangkan informasi bisnis terkait untuk mengidentifikasi dan memahami tren/pola data.

Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing toolsProvides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices EnvironmentAssist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findingsLiasing with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring ThreatsAnalyse and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flowEscalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scannerConduct scheduled Vulnerability Management

About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress

Menganalisis data dan informasi bisnis dari berbagai sumber untuk menghasilkan insight atas tren/pola dari data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis bagi para stakeholder.Mengidentifikasi, mengumpulkan, dan membersihkan data terstruktur maupun tidak terstruktur dari berbagai sumber untuk menyiapkan proses analisis data.Mengembangkan produk atau existing data untuk use case baru dalam analisis data.Menganalisis dan menginterpretasi data dalam jumlah besar dengan mempertimbangkan informasi bisnis terkait untuk mengidentifikasi dan memahami tren/pola data.

Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing toolsProvides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices EnvironmentAssist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findingsLiasing with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring ThreatsAnalyse and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flowEscalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scannerConduct scheduled Vulnerability Management

About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress

Company: SMS Perkasa (PT Sumber Makmur Surya Perkasa)
Desc: What are your responsibilities?This role requires you to beable to work as a team. You are responsible tomaintainandcreate data endpointsfor a front-end developer. You also need towrite testable and clean codeto develop highlyreliableandmaintainable code. Your primary focus will be onproviding back-end service for our websiteandour ERP.

Job_title: Branch Manager Development Program (Area Jawa Bal Nusra)
Desc: On the Supervisor programLearn how to understanding Basic Knowledge and policy of SMS FinanceApplying Marketing & Collection Spv knowledge into practical application in real-life settingOn the Branch Manager programLearn how to understanding monitoring and controlling as Branch ManagerObserving Branch Manager activity, analyze and solve complex problemManage Branch and show performance as Branch Manager

Job_title: Synergy Value Chain & Business Partnership Analyst
Desc: Formulate synergy/collaboration needed to strengthen and compliment Astra Financial Business.Initiate synergy/collaboration within Astra Ecosystem or with external partners that will compliment Astra Financial digital initiatives business.Do PDCA and review for every collaboration (reporting & monitoring)Support on making strategy for business partnership collaboration for digital initiatives for Astra Financial digital ventures (SEVA, MOXA, DaaS/CaaS & Digital Bank).Do execution for the strategy that has been formulated and approved by management.

As Center Manager, you are responsible for the center’s day-to-day operational activities. You are responsible for a center’s staff, customer, and business performance. You are expected to lead center revenue performance, support day-to-day center operations, and manage center team.Key ResponsibilitiesEmbody EF core values and set a service-oriented, collaborative culture in the center through role-modelling.Engage with customers actively and personally and create an environment in which all staff treat our customers respectfully, like they are your first or last.Identify new ways to deliver the best customer services; take care of customer complaints and turn unhappy or angry customers into our advocate.Responsible to the achievement of Center’s revenue by leading the team through various customer acquisition channels, including referral and retention of current students.Monitor the center performance through verification and analysis of sales reports and student satisfaction reports (NPS results); make sure center follows all EF English Center processes, policies, and procedures.Lead the Sales, Service and Academic team in acquiring new students, maintaining number of students and ensure memorable learning experience throughout the study period.Come up with ideas and feedback in order to make things better, that help improve the business continuously.Ensure a safe, clean, delightful working and learning environment for staff and students; in a nutshell, run and grow a meaningful business with sound financial result, through people and service.

Memastikan operasional environment DC & DRC berjalan dengan baik dan meminimalisir kemungkinan gangguan atau critical event dan kegagalan operasi dalam mendukung operasional bisnis perusahaanMelakukan aktivitas-aktivitas rutin IT yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan bisnis utama perbankan seperti proses back up, proses end of day, end of month, dsbMelakukan pemeliharaan switching DC-DRC, core switch dan core router DC-DRCMenyediakan laporan performance mesin AS 400, DC-DRC secara berkalaMelakukan manage configurationBerperan serta dalam pengusulan inisiatif untuk perbaikan kinerja layanan

Company: DOKU, PT NUSA SATU INTI ARTHA
Desc: Mampu membuat laporan hasil temuan atau jika adanya security anomali.Mampu memberi saran atau solusi teknis untuk tim TI dan tim software developerMenindaklanjuti hasil temuan kerentanan ke tim terkaitMampu menggunakan Tools Security Testing atau membuat tools sendiriWajib mendokumentasikan semua proses pekerjaan dengan detail.

Producing code using .NET Core.Net, Sequel, C#Upgrading, configuring and debugging existing systemsProviding technical support for web, desktop or mobile applications

Memastikan operasional environment DC & DRC berjalan dengan baik dan meminimalisir kemungkinan gangguan atau critical event dan kegagalan operasi dalam mendukung operasional bisnis perusahaanMelakukan aktivitas-aktivitas rutin IT yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan bisnis utama perbankan seperti proses back up, proses end of day, end of month, dsbMelakukan pemeliharaan switching DC-DRC, core switch dan core router DC-DRCMenyediakan laporan performance mesin AS 400, DC-DRC secara berkalaMelakukan manage configurationBerperan serta dalam pengusulan inisiatif untuk perbaikan kinerja layanan

Job_title: Branch Manager Development Program (Area Sumatera Bag Selatan)
Desc: On the Supervisor programLearn how to understanding Basic Knowledge and policy of SMS FinanceApplying Marketing & Collection Spv knowledge into practical application in real-life settingOn the Branch Manager programLearn how to understanding monitoring and controlling as Branch ManagerObserving Branch Manager activity, analyze and solve complex problemManage Branch and show performance as Branch Manager

Design, develop, and ship product features and improvementsResearch, conceive, design, and develop backend components and tools to extend, improve, stabilize your team's backend.Take an active role in code reviews & pull requests, get your own code reviewed by the team and become a better developer overallPartnering closely with the Product Team to evaluate the technical feasibility, release, and timely execution of featuresAnalyze carrier requirements, with a larger team, to define high level architecture, collaborate with senior developers across the team on design.Review and approve the detailed designs.Drive all aspects of the development including requirements definition, design, implementation, unit testing, and integration.

Menganalisis data dan informasi bisnis dari berbagai sumber untuk menghasilkan insight atas tren/pola dari data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis bagi para stakeholder.Mengidentifikasi, mengumpulkan, dan membersihkan data terstruktur maupun tidak terstruktur dari berbagai sumber untuk menyiapkan proses analisis data.Mengembangkan produk atau existing data untuk use case baru dalam analisis data.Menganalisis dan menginterpretasi data dalam jumlah besar dengan mempertimbangkan informasi bisnis terkait untuk mengidentifikasi dan memahami tren/pola data.

Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing toolsProvides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices EnvironmentAssist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findingsLiasing with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring ThreatsAnalyse and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flowEscalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scannerConduct scheduled Vulnerability Management

About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress

Menganalisis data dan informasi bisnis dari berbagai sumber untuk menghasilkan insight atas tren/pola dari data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis bagi para stakeholder.Mengidentifikasi, mengumpulkan, dan membersihkan data terstruktur maupun tidak terstruktur dari berbagai sumber untuk menyiapkan proses analisis data.Mengembangkan produk atau existing data untuk use case baru dalam analisis data.Menganalisis dan menginterpretasi data dalam jumlah besar dengan mempertimbangkan informasi bisnis terkait untuk mengidentifikasi dan memahami tren/pola data.

Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing toolsProvides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices EnvironmentAssist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findingsLiasing with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring ThreatsAnalyse and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flowEscalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scannerConduct scheduled Vulnerability Management

About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress

Company: SMS Perkasa (PT Sumber Makmur Surya Perkasa)
Desc: What are your responsibilities?This role requires you to beable to work as a team. You are responsible tomaintainandcreate data endpointsfor a front-end developer. You also need towrite testable and clean codeto develop highlyreliableandmaintainable code. Your primary focus will be onproviding back-end service for our websiteandour ERP.

Job_title: Branch Manager Development Program (Area Jawa Bal Nusra)
Desc: On the Supervisor programLearn how to understanding Basic Knowledge and policy of SMS FinanceApplying Marketing & Collection Spv knowledge into practical application in real-life settingOn the Branch Manager programLearn how to understanding monitoring and controlling as Branch ManagerObserving Branch Manager activity, analyze and solve complex problemManage Branch and show performance as Branch Manager

Job_title: Synergy Value Chain & Business Partnership Analyst
Desc: Formulate synergy/collaboration needed to strengthen and compliment Astra Financial Business.Initiate synergy/collaboration within Astra Ecosystem or with external partners that will compliment Astra Financial digital initiatives business.Do PDCA and review for every collaboration (reporting & monitoring)Support on making strategy for business partnership collaboration for digital initiatives for Astra Financial digital ventures (SEVA, MOXA, DaaS/CaaS & Digital Bank).Do execution for the strategy that has been formulated and approved by management.

As Center Manager, you are responsible for the center’s day-to-day operational activities. You are responsible for a center’s staff, customer, and business performance. You are expected to lead center revenue performance, support day-to-day center operations, and manage center team.Key ResponsibilitiesEmbody EF core values and set a service-oriented, collaborative culture in the center through role-modelling.Engage with customers actively and personally and create an environment in which all staff treat our customers respectfully, like they are your first or last.Identify new ways to deliver the best customer services; take care of customer complaints and turn unhappy or angry customers into our advocate.Responsible to the achievement of Center’s revenue by leading the team through various customer acquisition channels, including referral and retention of current students.Monitor the center performance through verification and analysis of sales reports and student satisfaction reports (NPS results); make sure center follows all EF English Center processes, policies, and procedures.Lead the Sales, Service and Academic team in acquiring new students, maintaining number of students and ensure memorable learning experience throughout the study period.Come up with ideas and feedback in order to make things better, that help improve the business continuously.Ensure a safe, clean, delightful working and learning environment for staff and students; in a nutshell, run and grow a meaningful business with sound financial result, through people and service.

Memastikan operasional environment DC & DRC berjalan dengan baik dan meminimalisir kemungkinan gangguan atau critical event dan kegagalan operasi dalam mendukung operasional bisnis perusahaanMelakukan aktivitas-aktivitas rutin IT yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan bisnis utama perbankan seperti proses back up, proses end of day, end of month, dsbMelakukan pemeliharaan switching DC-DRC, core switch dan core router DC-DRCMenyediakan laporan performance mesin AS 400, DC-DRC secara berkalaMelakukan manage configurationBerperan serta dalam pengusulan inisiatif untuk perbaikan kinerja layanan

Company: DOKU, PT NUSA SATU INTI ARTHA
Desc: Mampu membuat laporan hasil temuan atau jika adanya security anomali.Mampu memberi saran atau solusi teknis untuk tim TI dan tim software developerMenindaklanjuti hasil temuan kerentanan ke tim terkaitMampu menggunakan Tools Security Testing atau membuat tools sendiriWajib mendokumentasikan semua proses pekerjaan dengan detail.

Producing code using .NET Core.Net, Sequel, C#Upgrading, configuring and debugging existing systemsProviding technical support for web, desktop or mobile applications

Memastikan operasional environment DC & DRC berjalan dengan baik dan meminimalisir kemungkinan gangguan atau critical event dan kegagalan operasi dalam mendukung operasional bisnis perusahaanMelakukan aktivitas-aktivitas rutin IT yang berkaitan dengan kegiatan bisnis utama perbankan seperti proses back up, proses end of day, end of month, dsbMelakukan pemeliharaan switching DC-DRC, core switch dan core router DC-DRCMenyediakan laporan performance mesin AS 400, DC-DRC secara berkalaMelakukan manage configurationBerperan serta dalam pengusulan inisiatif untuk perbaikan kinerja layanan

Job_title: Branch Manager Development Program (Area Sumatera Bag Selatan)
Desc: On the Supervisor programLearn how to understanding Basic Knowledge and policy of SMS FinanceApplying Marketing & Collection Spv knowledge into practical application in real-life settingOn the Branch Manager programLearn how to understanding monitoring and controlling as Branch ManagerObserving Branch Manager activity, analyze and solve complex problemManage Branch and show performance as Branch Manager

Design, develop, and ship product features and improvementsResearch, conceive, design, and develop backend components and tools to extend, improve, stabilize your team's backend.Take an active role in code reviews & pull requests, get your own code reviewed by the team and become a better developer overallPartnering closely with the Product Team to evaluate the technical feasibility, release, and timely execution of featuresAnalyze carrier requirements, with a larger team, to define high level architecture, collaborate with senior developers across the team on design.Review and approve the detailed designs.Drive all aspects of the development including requirements definition, design, implementation, unit testing, and integration.

Menganalisis data dan informasi bisnis dari berbagai sumber untuk menghasilkan insight atas tren/pola dari data untuk mendukung pengambilan keputusan bisnis bagi para stakeholder.Mengidentifikasi, mengumpulkan, dan membersihkan data terstruktur maupun tidak terstruktur dari berbagai sumber untuk menyiapkan proses analisis data.Mengembangkan produk atau existing data untuk use case baru dalam analisis data.Menganalisis dan menginterpretasi data dalam jumlah besar dengan mempertimbangkan informasi bisnis terkait untuk mengidentifikasi dan memahami tren/pola data.

Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing toolsProvides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices EnvironmentAssist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findingsLiasing with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring ThreatsAnalyse and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flowEscalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scannerConduct scheduled Vulnerability Management

About the challengeDo you have great communication skills? Are you interested to learn more about account management & telesales, and develop skills for a successful career in sales, account management or customer service? Are you looking for a great place to start or further your career?In this opportunity, you will be trained to develop yourself as a Telemarketer and will learn a lot about telesales, account management & customer service. Your role is to facilitate the communication between Lamudi and it’s end-users, and provide excellent customer service all the way through.About LamudiOur mission is to provide any Indonesian the most trustworthy and reliable way to buy a property. We do this by using technology to empower 10,000+ real estate agents and 100's property developers by connecting them to millions of prospective buyers previously beyond their reach.What a day at work for you will look like:You will provide AAA service on the phone to make potential customers enthusiastic about our productYou will sell Lamudi memberships to property agents over the phoneYou will advise your customers on the best products for them to useYou will build great relations with your customers over the phoneYou will manage your pipeline in our CRM (salesforce) and keeping management up to date of your progress
